abstract: Nobel medal awarded in 1971 to economist Simon Kuznets sells at auction by Nate D Sanders Auctions for $390,848; is first medal from field of economics ever sold.
lead_paragraph: The medal awarded to the economist Simon Kuznets in 1971 was sold to an unidentified bidder for $390,848, one of only a few such medals ever to have been sold.

headline.main: What’s an Economist’s Nobel Medal Worth? $390,848
headline.print_headline: What’s an Economist’s Nobel Medal Worth? $390,848

snippet: The medal awarded to the economist Simon Kuznets in 1971 was sold to an unidentified bidder for $390,848, one of only a few such medals ever to have been sold.
